headline: As Gold Hits A Record High, GDX Shines

headline: Franklin Gold And Precious Metals Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: After reaching all-time nominal highs amid sustained haven demand, gold prices plateaued in 4Q24, ending the quarter with a -0.4% return in the spot market, to $2,625 per troy ounce.
